page.title: 15Crichel Estate Tenant Farm
page.content: HEMSWORTH FARM This farm which belongs to Crichel Estate has as a tenant Mr Stewart Tory and his son Michael Tory. The farm extends to 1000 acres and lies to the South West of Witchampton and stretches towards Tarrant Rushton and now includes Tarrant Rushton airfield. The farmhouse itself is very old and it is thought that some of the building dates to the 13th century.It is mentioned in the Domesday Book. The farm itself totals 1000 acres of which 250 are grazing land and the remainder mainly cereal crops. The farm is famous for its flock of Hampshire Down sheep which are exported all over the world.The flock has 520 breeding ewes with 250 lambs being born Winter 84/85 when 2 shepherds help on alternate nights. The farm is run by the tenant, his son and 5 workers.
